name: in equilibrium with contradictions
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Mixed Technique//3000x3000 pixel//Contradictions are also impressive facts that lead to harmony. Let's not care too much, sometimes everything is contradictory//Drawing is an impressive language for me with its universal and differentiating structure in every viewer. I also love and use the automatism method because it is a pleasant and mysterious way to express myself and what I perceive about existence, the world, and life
